title: Trade Item Data Asset Schema
description: Schema definition for Trade Item Data Assets in Adastrea

ItemName.description: Display name of the trade item

ItemID.description: Unique identifier for the trade item

MaterialData.description: Optional reference to material data asset (e.g., DA_Material_Platinum)

VolatilityMultiplier.description: Base volatility multiplier (0.0 = stable, 1.0 = normal, 2.0+ = very volatile)

MinPriceDeviation.description: Minimum price deviation as percentage (e.g., 0.5 = 50% below base)

MaxPriceDeviation.description: Maximum price deviation as percentage (e.g., 2.0 = 200% above base)

bAffectedBySupplyDemand.description: Whether this item's price is affected by supply/demand

bAffectedByMarketEvents.description: Whether this item's price is affected by market events

BannedFactions.description: Factions that ban this item completely

MinReputationRequired.description: Minimum faction reputation required to trade

ContrabandFineMultiplier.description: Contraband fine multiplier if caught (1.0 = base price)

StandardLotSize.description: Typical lot size for bulk trading

TypicalMarketStock.description: Maximum quantity typically available in markets

ReplenishmentRate.description: How quickly stock replenishes (units per game day)

AITradePriority.description: Priority for AI traders (1-10, higher = more desirable)

bAIHoardable.description: Whether AI traders will hoard this during shortages

bAIArbitrageEnabled.description: Whether AI traders will use this for arbitrage

BehaviorTags.description: Tags for AI behavior and categorization
